snippet: The young-apparel retailer says a financing deal with the boutique investment bank B. Riley could help save part of its business.
abstract: Young-apparel retailer Wet Seal files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, though it says financing deal from boutique bank could still save some of its stores; filing marks significant decline in fortunes for company that was once a Wall Street darling.
lead_paragraph: The young-apparel retailer says a financing deal with the boutique investment bank B. Riley could help save part of its business.

headline.main: Chapter 11 for Wet Seal as Tastes Change
headline.print_headline: Chapter 11 for Wet Seal as Tastes Change
